title: DJK Agon 08 Düsseldorf
text:
DJK Agon 08 Düsseldorf is a German <a href="association%20football">football</a> and <a href="sports%20club">sports club</a> from <a href="D%C3%BCsseldorf">Düsseldorf</a>.
Its women's <a href="basketball">basketball</a> section dominated the <a href="Damen-Basketball-Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a> through the 1980s winning eleven championships between 1980 and 1991, and reached the final of the <a href="Euroleague%20Women">European Cup</a> in 1983 and 1986 under the guidance of coach <a href="Tony%20DiLeo">Tony DiLeo</a>. Agon Düsseldorf also has <a href="Athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a>, <a href="badminton">badminton</a>, <a href="team%20handball">handball</a>, <a href="tennis">tennis</a>, <a href="table%20tennis">table tennis</a> and <a href="volleyball">volleyball</a> teams. The men's football squad plays in <a href="Kreisliga">Kreisliga</a> A (VIII).
